text: There are no gradients in any values represented by the JSON results cards, so I won't be able to implement that until I have some values to work with

<@U02F8TTPU>: let me know how you're feeling about marching towards a build push when you get a sec
I just pushed it to Fabric now
Ok, was hoping to get a few quick changes in with this build.
There's one issue where Andy requests that we change the app name to "Android Gather" so he can check it out on this latest build.
Would it be possible to make that change (and possibly one other quick copy change if you have a sec) and repush the build?

1.3 release notes:
Local notification service with logic and settings integration
Background audio should pause on playing experience
Native frame animations to improve visual speed
Updated results cards (map styling, improved bar chart for tablets, new gradient information)
Thank you!
<@U02F8TTPU>:  testing a quick stopgap for the splash issue on samsung
will let you know if i finish in time!

in. should be two files changed: splash layout, and splash activity
Got it. Just finished my changes too, so I'll increment the build, push my changes, resolve the jira tickets and upload the build to Fabric.
sweet. My issue isn't complete, but maybe a note about it?

I'll put it in the release notes

OK, distributed 1.4 on Fabric. Release notes:
Replaced app icon with new assets
Temporary memory workaround for animations on Samsung devices
Renamed label to Android Gather
Removed copyright text from About screen
Perfect, thanks so much Marissa!!
